## Checklist

<!-- Complete before requesting review -->

### Pre-Review Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No unnecessary console.log or debug code
- [ ] All tests passing locally
- [ ] **Spec-kit review completed** (if applicable)

### Spec-Kit Workflow Checklist

<!-- Only for spec-kit workflows -->

- [ ] Spec file (`spec.md`) created and complete
- [ ] Plan file (`plan.md`) created and complete
- [ ] Tasks file (`tasks.md`) created and complete
- [ ] **Review file (`review.md`) created and approved**
- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] All tasks completed

### Quality Checklist

- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] Branch is up to date with base branch
- [ ] CI/CD checks passing
- [ ] No new warnings or errors introduced
- [ ] Performance impact considered
